Name: task
Description: The taskgroup construct specifies a wait on completion of child tasks of the current task and their descendent tasks. It contrasts with the taskwait construct which waits only on child tasks but not their descendents.

Languages.Prototype:

                  [default(policy)]
                  [mergeable]
                  [private(list)]

                  [shared(list)]
                  [in_reduction([modifier,] identifier: list)]
                  [depend([modifier,] type: list)]
                  [priority(priority-value)]
                  [allocate([allocator:] list)]
                  [affinity([modifier:] list)]
